mapper.insert: insert into modification_team (modification_id, team_id, modification_type, modification_content, state, modification_place, original_data) values (#{modificationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modificationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modificationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modificationPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalData,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update modification_team set team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modification_type = #{modificationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modification_content = #{modificationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modification_place = #{modificationPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original_data = #{originalData,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where modification_id = #{modificationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE modification_team set state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where modification_id = #{modificationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select modification_id, team_id, modification_type, modification_content, state, modification_place, original_data from modification_team where modification_id = #{modificationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select modification_id, team_id, modification_type, modification_content, state, modification_place, original_data from modification_team
